Header.title: One bite is never enough
Header.paragraph: At Puff Lab, one bite is never enoughâ€”experience the perfect blend of flavor, quality, and heart in every cream puff!

About.paragraph: It all began with an entrepreneurship course, where our group of eight brainstormed business ideas. Among various suggestions, one member proposed Japanese cream puffs, which we eagerly pursued. The idea gained praise, and our lecturer encouraged us to take it further.Eventually, only two of us committed to continuing, later inviting a friend from accounting to join the team. We won several competitions and national awards. During the pandemic, we adapted by shifting to online sales.After two years, we opened a physical shop at Kuching and expanded our market by participating in events across Kuching-Samarahan. With our sights set high, we aim to take the business to the next level.
Why: The best crusted cream puff producer in Malaysia.
Supporting B40 students with job opportunities and delivering top-quality, unique cream puffs.
Provide financial aid to students through social entrepreneurship and build a strong, recognizable brand
Meet sales targets with highly demanded cream puffs.
Why2: We are now on Grab apps. No more depends on our COD days.
decorate your own cream puff topping as low as 20cents.
Ethe perfect treat for a special occasion
